extendedInfo.description: Learn the most common Chinese characters on your phone. Characters 201-300.-Pinyin pronunciations, definitions, and examples of each character-Ability to mark the cards you miss and review them later-View the cards in sequential or random order-Includes both simplified and traditional charactersby http://dopdot.com

reviews.comment: Feedback email down. Nice apps, clear defs; they would be awesome with options to: have Eng/Pin first, dim/hide trad chars, finger swipe to next card.
reviews.author: A Google User
